summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1281, for the improvement of East Garfield Street from 15th Avenue North to 17th Avenue North; and 17th Avenue North from East Garfield Street to East Galer Street, all in the City of Seattle by grading, curbing and constructing concrete walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 13973, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof, shown on said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
